definition: to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)
Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods
the four great Chinese inventions: paper, printing, magnetic compass and gunpowder
to invent and innovate/inventions and innovations
Necessity is the mother of invention (European proverb).
pinyin: xu1 yao4 shi4 fa1 ming2 zhi1 mu3

sentences.english: Some of Pedini collections includes nice re-invent of inline kitchen layouts.
sentences.chinese: 一些佩蒂尼的产品包含了重新发明的内嵌厨具布局。

sentences.english: The present invention relates to methods and structures for the metallization of semiconductor devices.
sentences.chinese: 本发明涉及半导体器件的金属化的方法和结构。

sentences.english: The invention discloses a construction method for a door opening of an old structural underground wall.
sentences.chinese: 本发明公开了一种老结构地下墙开门洞施工方法。

sentences.english: The invention discloses a device and a method for real-time stream file storage.
sentences.chinese: 本发明公开了一种实时流文件存储装置及其方法。

sentences.english: The invention also relates to tyrosine hydroxylase revulsant.
sentences.chinese: 本发明化合物是酪氨酸羟化酶诱导剂。

sentences.english: The invention relates to a system and a method for manufacturing flakes of liquid-based cytology.
sentences.chinese: 本发明是关于一种液基细胞学制片系统以及制片方法。

sentences.english: The invention also discloses a producing method of above light leading board .
sentences.chinese: 本发明还揭露了一种制造上述导光板的方法。

sentences.english: The invention discloses a method for detoxicating rapeseed cakes or rapeseed dregs.
sentences.chinese: 本发明公开了一种菜籽饼或菜籽粕的脱毒方法。

sentences.english: By using the method provided by the invention, the soap containing the tannin can be prepared.
sentences.chinese: 利用本发明提供的方法，可制备含有单宁酸的香皂。

sentences.english: Only human art or science or art, human contrivance, can bring about peace.
sentences.chinese: 只有人类的艺术或科学，人类的发明，能够带来和平。

sentences.english: She had a wonderful opportunity, but she muffed it.
sentences.chinese: 新发明具有极好的未来。

sentences.english: The present invention relates to a wheat germ nutrient flour and its preparation method.
sentences.chinese: 本发明涉及一种麦胚营养粉及其制备方法。

sentences.english: The present invention discloses one kind of electric roaster capable of controlling the oil content of cooked food.
sentences.chinese: 本发明公开了一种可控制烹饪食物油脂的电烤炉。

sentences.english: The indirect fume temperature regulator can save energy consumption and water consumption and solve the problem of gas leakage.
sentences.chinese: 本发明能节约能耗，水耗，并能避免煤气泄漏的问题。

sentences.english: The ice storage tank provided by the invention is mainly applied to the evaporative supercooled water continuous ice-making system.
sentences.chinese: 本发明主要应用于蒸发式过冷水连续制冰系统。

sentences.english: FIG. 6 is a top view of an induction coil of the present invention.
sentences.chinese: 图六为本发明的一个感应线圈的侧视图。

definition: to invent and innovate/inventions and innovations
to create/to inaugurate/to contrive/to build (a mechanism)
the four great Chinese inventions: paper, printing, magnetic compass and gunpowder
patent/sth uniquely enjoyed (or possessed etc) by a certain group of people/monopoly
Edison (name)/Thomas Alva Edison (1847-1931), American inventor and businessman
